snippet: Catalonia is organising the logistics for a referendum on independence from Spain it plans to hold by the end of September, even if it goes against the wishes of the national government, the Catalan government's foreign policy chief said....

headline.main: 2 Charged With Trying to Bring Loaded Guns Onto Planes
headline.print_headline: 2 Charged With Trying to Bring Loaded Guns Onto Planes

lead_paragraph: Catalonia is organising the logistics for a referendum on independence from Spain it plans to hold by the end of September, even if it goes against the wishes of the national government, the Catalan government's foreign policy chief said.
